page.title: 16THE CRICKET CLUB
page.content: {Rodmarton cricket club}was formed approximately 60 years ago with the squire, the{Hon.Claude Biddulph}& his son, Major A.Biddulph taking a keen interest in it as his grandsons, Simon & Jasper now do. Major Biddulph kept upthe interest until his death in 1984 At one time all the team came from Rodmarton but as the years went by and young people moved out to find work players came from further afield{.Now sadly, there are only{14 players}in the club.They are keen and though the atmosphere is friendly they go out determined to win.At the end of the season the team usually have won as many games as they have lost. The field is infront of the village hall where teas are served. At the end of the season players & their wives , committee members and supporters have an Xmas dinner and then presentations.
